Patrick Smith, 23, has won an Apprentice-style competition to get a highly-prized job on a national magazine.
Patrick, from Dukinfield, Greater Manchester, beat off more than 60 other cub reporters to win one of two year-long jobs at the Press Gazette, the weekly industry magazine for journalists.
He was chosen as one of the finalists to take part in the Press Gazette&rsquo
column3: where junior reporters take part in weekly tasks with two being eliminated each week, X-Factor-style.
